Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kurankot.busreservationsystem.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable

    Main class, that control window application and connect Searching algorithm with other application

        public void searchData(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

        method after "HLADAT" button in main window

        Parameters:

      • customizeResultData

        public ResultData customizeResultData(ResultData resultData)

        Customize result data for better manipulation for output

        Forexample for links trace 201 -1 201 -1 203 reduce to 201 -1 203, where numbers except -1 are concrete links between two cities connect with edge

        Parameters:
        resultData -
        Returns:
        ResultData object

      • findResult

        public ResultData findResult(int from,
                             int dest,
                             java.lang.String timeString)

        Run searching algorithm

        Parameters:
        from - is integer number of starting node
        dest - is integer number of ending node
        timeString - is string time in format "hh:mm"
        Returns:
        ResultData from searching algorithm.

      • showResult

        public int showResult(java.lang.String fromString,
                      java.lang.String toString,
                      java.lang.String timeString,
                      java.lang.String dateString,
                      ResultData result,
                      int lastLineY,
                      int i)

        Showing result to main window after searching

        calls createAndAddNewItem() method for adding new item. Item is one result from searching algorithm

        Parameters:
        fromString - is string representation of starting city
        toString - is string representation of ending city
        timeString - is string representation of starting time
        dateString - is string representation of date in format "yyyy-mm-dd"
        result - is ResultData from searching algorithm
        lastLineY - is int number represents Y position of last added element to window
        i - is int representation of cycle, which represent number of showing results to main window. Default is set to 3
        Returns:
        int number represents Y position of last added element to window

      • createAndAddNewItem

        public int createAndAddNewItem(int firstLineY,
                               java.lang.String[] cityThroughTravel,
                               ResultData result,
                               int i,
                               java.lang.String date,
                               java.lang.String startTime)

        Creates and adds new result from searching algorithm

        Parameters:
        firstLineY - is int representation of first line in Y dir.
        cityThroughTravel - is String array of cities through which the road leads
        result - is ResultData from searching algorithm
        i - is actual state form cycle from calling method. Cycle represent number of showing results in window
        date - is string representation of input date
        startTime - is string representation of start time
        Returns:
        int represents Y position of next item which may be added next

      • setReservation

        public void setReservation(java.lang.Integer selectedSeat,
                           int line,
                           java.lang.String date,
                           java.lang.String startCity,
                           java.lang.String endCity)

        Setting and writting new reservation to file

        Parameters:
        selectedSeat - is int number of selected seat by user
        line - is int representation of line
        date - is String representation of date
        startCity - is String representation of starting city
        endCity - is String representation of ending city

      • showReservation

        public void showReservation(javafx.scene.layout.Pane mainBuyTicket,
                            int nextLineLableY,
                            java.lang.String[] cityThroughTravel,
                            int ctt,
                            java.lang.String date,
                            int line)

        Showing reservation and buying dialog

        Parameters:
        mainBuyTicket - is pane representation of new window
        nextLineLableY - is Y number of next element which may be added to pane
        cityThroughTravel - is String array of cities through which the road leads
        ctt - is int number of actual state in cycle from calling method
        date - is String representation of date
        line - is int representation of line

      • findEmptySeats

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> findEmptySeats(ReservationFile content,
                                                             java.lang.String startCity,
                                                             java.lang.String endCity,
                                                             java.lang.String[] lineDetailRoute)

        Finding of empty seats for concreate bus

        Parameters:
        content - is ReservationFile representation of json file where is info about seats availability
        startCity - is String representation of starting city
        endCity - is String representation of ending city
        lineDetailRoute - is array of String represents detail of actual route
        Returns:
        ArrayList represents empty seats
